allowance(address,address).details: return the amount the the owner has authorized a third party address to spend

params.spender: address responsible for spending in behalf of the owner

approve(address,uint256).details: approve an address to spend tokens on behalf of owner

params.spender: address to spend in behalf of owner
params.value: amount of tokens to be authorized

balanceOf(address).details: function that return the balance of an specific address

params.owner: the address that you want to know the balance

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: downgrade the allowance for an address to spend in behalf of other

params.spender: address to spend tokens in behalf of owner
params.subtractedValue: value to be downgraded from the spender allowance

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: uprise the allowance of an address to spend in behalf of other

params.addedValue: amount of tokens to be uprised on allowance

totalSupply().details: function to check the total supply

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer tokens from the sender to an specific address

params.to: address where the owner wants to send tokens
params.value: value in which the owner wants to transfer in wei

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: spend tokens in behalf of owner

params.to: address where the tokens will be sent
params.value: amount of tokens to be spended
